Rotation.RotationList: Aimed Shot Camouflage|Scatter Shot|Traplauncher|Traplauncher2|FreezingTrap|Explosive Trap|Ice Trap|Snake Trap|--- defensive spells ---|Camouflage|Misdirection|Mend Pet|Hunter's Mark|Assist Tank|--- offensive spells ---|Tranquilizing Shot|Masters Call|Raptor Strike|Rapid Fire|Readiness|Aimed Shot Proc|Kill Shot|Aspect of the Fox|Steady Shot|Serpent Sting|Aspect of the Hawk|Chimera Shot|USE: Gloves|USE: Trinket 1|USE: Trinket 2|Aimed Shot|Multi-Shot|Arcane Shot
Rotation.RotationNotes:
-- Tested with this build http://www.wowhead.com/talent#ccbMZfRGoGoMuroc
-- Hotkeys Hold down LEFT ALT pause rotation Hold down LEFT SHIFT to use Scatter Shot on mouseover Hold down LEFT CONTROL to activate Trap Launcher Tap RIGHT CONTROL to switch single/aoe rotation
-- Behaviour Rotation pause while trap launcher is active to allow use any trap Serpent sting is only casted on mobs with highter hp than player Hunter Mark cast out of combat if target hp is highter than player hp
